name: Redish (AIE Major Production)
description:
Detox is a Third person RPG headed by a courageous fairy trying to cure her home forest of The Corruption. Gameplay 

The player starts in their Backyard; originally there is one plant that they must Purify within the Backyard. The player must then Purify the Corrupted area. Once the player passes this tutorial, they are released into a forest filled with other magically Corrupted plants. These Corrupted plants have a noticeably darker coloration, setting them apart from the healthy plants. When the player leaves the safe area their health begins to deteriorate; in order to recuperate HP the player must use items dropped during Purification to craft potions. If the player Purifies all the plants in the level they win!
